name: OpenClaw on DigitalOcean
tagline: Deploy your personal AI assistant with WhatsApp, Telegram, Gmail, and Google Docs
description: A complete setup for OpenClaw on a DigitalOcean droplet. Can create the droplet automatically using doctl (DigitalOcean CLI) or connect to an existing one. Includes swap optimization and guided setup for WhatsApp (with dedicated number), Telegram bot, Gmail Pub/Sub integration, and Google Docs/Drive access.

credits.name: OpenClaw
credits.description: OpenClaw is a personal AI assistant. This rig automates the official DigitalOcean deployment guide and adds channel setup for WhatsApp, Telegram, and Gmail.

whatItDoes: Deploys OpenClaw on a DigitalOcean droplet ($6/month) with full messaging and document integration. The installer runs from your local machine, SSHs into the droplet, installs OpenClaw with systemd persistence, and walks you through connecting WhatsApp (with a dedicated number), Telegram (via BotFather), Gmail (via Pub/Sub), and Google Docs/Drive (read and write access). After setup, your AI assistant responds on all three channels and can read/write Google Docs it has access to.
useCases: Personal AI assistant accessible via WhatsApp, Telegram, and email
Always-on AI that runs 24/7 on a cheap VPS
Private alternative to cloud AI assistants
